title: Outbound Calling VA
job_overview:
Position Overview
We’re seeking a motivated and energetic Cold Caller - Real Estate VA to drive our outbound lead generation efforts. This is a full-time, remote opportunity where you’ll reach out to potential home sellers, qualify prospects, and manage lead data within our CRM. Success in this role requires excellent spoken English, a confident and courteous phone presence, and the ability to maintain Upgrade to see actual infontum in a high-volume calling environment. Be part of a fast-growing team where your impact is direct and measurable!
Key Responsibilities
- Make 250–300 outbound calls daily using an auto-dialing system
- Use pre-written scripts to initiate conversations and collect essential details
- Spot motivated sellers and log accurate information into the CRM
- Record detailed notes from each call and input data efficiently
- Schedule follow-ups and escalate urgent leads for further attention
- Collaborate with the acquisitions team to assess lead quality and conversion progress


Qualifications We Value
- Clear and fluent spoken English with a friendly, persuasive tone
- Prior experience in cold calling, sales, or real estate outreach
- Strong listening abilities and comfort using structured scripts
- Self-discipline to hit daily call goals consistently
- Basic computer knowledge and ease working with digital tools


Preferred Experience
- Familiarity with CRM platforms like Podio, Zoho, or REsimpli
- Knowledge of dialers such as Mojo or CallTools
- Experience communicating with U.S. homeowners or real estate investors
- Quiet work environment with stable internet and quality audio equipment
- Coachable mindset and a desire for continuous improvement
Why Work With Us?
We provide a collaborative, performance-focused setting where you can grow professionally and contribute meaningfully. Your efforts will directly support our property acquisition pipeline and help shape our success. If you thrive in a phone-heavy role, enjoy connecting with people, and are eager to be part of a high-achieving team, we’d love to hear from you!
